snippet: A new agreement between Greece and its creditors push stocks up. Nearly three stocks rose for every one that fell on the New York Exchange.
abstract: Stock market lifts and extends winning streak to third day due to agreement between Greece and its creditors.
lead_paragraph: A new agreement between Greece and its creditors push stocks up. Nearly three stocks rose for every one that fell on the New York Exchange.

headline.main: Deal for Greece Drives a Wide-Ranging Advance in the Market
headline.print_headline: Cheered by Greece News, Investors Look to Earnings
